description: Tonight, though, we've got something extra hot boiling over in our War Chest Updates for you. Remember that sexy little devil named Payne with the impish grin? Well, I almost thought we'd lost Payne, but he resurfaced after being sent away for some training. He ended up back here after all was said and done. Anyway, we kept in close contact while he was away because he knew there was a chance he'd be back. Sure enough, the first week he got back he was over getting naked again. Have I mentioned how personally crazy about Payne that I am? Well, I am totally crazy about this hot little devil. And, he's a genuinely nice guy. I can't hold out on you anymore, Payne has finally crossed the line for us here at Active Duty and he's done several scenes now with other guys. He first did a bi sexual scene for the bi line that Cole has been working on and then we slowly moved him into full-on male/male action. I gotta tell you, Payne is one hell of a performer. He really gets into what's going on and fits in just perfectly with the rest of the guys here at Active Duty. It took me a long time to crack this one, troops, but we've got him on our team now.
title: Payne, Scene #01
